title: Relates to the leave of absence for certain employees who served during armed conflicts on Memorial day and Veterans' day
summary: Relates to the leave of absence for certain employees who served during armed conflicts on Memorial day and Veterans' day; if such leave of absence would limit public transportation outside of a city with a population of one million or more, such persons shall be entitled to leave of absence with pay on another day in lieu thereof.
